name: star_name
description: Name of directory to create model in. All spectra will be stored in \verb|./star_name/|

name: star_teff
description: \teff~of the star in K

name: star_teff_min
description: Minimum temperature spectrum to include in binning

name: star_teff_max
description: Maximum temperature spectrum to include in binning

name: star_spot_initial_coverage
description: Spot coverage to begin with. This should only be used when spot timescales are much longer than the length of the observation.

name: star_spot_distribution
description: Method to distribute spots. \verb|iso| or \verb|solar|

name: star_spot_mean_area
description: Mean peak starspot area in MSH

name: star_spot_sigma_area
description: Lognormal sigma for mean peak starspot area in dex

name: star_spot_umbra_teff
description: \teff~of the spot umbra

name: star_spot_penumbra_teff
description: \teff~of the spot penumbra

name: star_spot_growth_rate
description: Fractional growth of spot area in day$^{-1}$. 0 means no growth.

name: star_spot_decay_rate
description: Decay rate of spots in MSH day$^{-1}$. 0 means no decay.

name: star_spot_initial_area
description: Initial area for newly birthed spots in MSH

name: star_spot_coverage
description: Desired fractional surface coverage of star spots in growth-decay equilibrium

name: star_spot_warmup
description: Time (in days) to ``warm up'' the star to reach growth-decay equilibrium

name: star_fac_coverage
description: Desired fractional surface coverage of faculae in growth-decay equilibrium

name: star_fac_mean_radius
description: Mean peak facula radius in km

name: star_fac_HWMH_radius
description: Facula radius distribution half-width-half-maximum in km. Difference between the peak of the radius distribution and the half maximum in the positive direction

name: star_fac_mean_timescale
description: Mean facula timescale in hr.

name: star_fac_HWMH_timescale
description: Facula timescale distribution half-width-half-maximum in hr. Difference between the peak of the timescale distribution and the half maximum in the positive direction

name: star_fac_distribution
description: Method to distribute faculae. Currently only \verb|iso| is supported.

name: star_fac_warmup
description: Time (in hr) to ``warm up'' the star to reach growth-decay equilibrium
